snippet.title: Marble Knights - Launch Trailer
snippet.description: Sword-swinging fantasy meets marble mania in Marble Knights, available now exclusively for Apple Arcade! Roll into battle with Orbin, Marabelle, and the other Knights of the Round to defend King Rolland and the Kingdom of Roundingham from the evil Lord Terroball! Armed with your blade, your wits, and a variety of orb-based powers, you’ll smite foes, solve puzzles, and embark on an epic fantasy journey for up to four players! Featuring an awesome anime-style intro by Studio TRIGGER! Check out the official site at https://wayforward.com/MarbleKnights/ and download the game at http://bit.ly/App_MarbleKnights!
